    • create

      public static RCaller create​(RCode rcode, RCallerOptions rCallerOptions)
      Static factory creator with given R code and startup options
      Parameters:
      rcode - RCode object that contains R code that will be run at the startup
      rCallerOptions - given startup object
      Returns:
      RCaller object

    • stopStreamConsumers

      public boolean stopStreamConsumers()
      Stops the threads that are emptying the output and error streams of the live but idle R process. If R is still working, this may cause it to hang. If R has finished execution, these threads prevent the operating system from shutting it down, so that the same process is used. Invoke this method when you have used R online and are finished with it.
      Returns:
      true if rOutput and rError are alive, else return false

    • startStreamConsumers

      public void startStreamConsumers​(Process process)

    • getCranRepos

      public String getCranRepos()
      Returns:
      The default Cran repository

    • setGraphicsTheme

      public void setGraphicsTheme​(GraphicsTheme theme)

    • deleteTempFiles

      public void deleteTempFiles()
      RCaller uses temp directory for many cases. This sometimes causes inflations of number of temporary files. This method deletes the file created by RCaller in temp directory.

    • runOnly

      public void runOnly() throws ExecutionException
      Executes the code contained in this RCaller instance in s separate process. Upon completion the process is killed and none of the R variables are returned
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - if R cannot be run for some reason

    • runAndReturnResultOnline

      public void runAndReturnResultOnline​(String var) throws ExecutionException
      Runs the current code in the existing R instance (or in a new one) and returns the R variable "var". The R process is kept alive and can be re-used by invoking this method again. When you are done with this process, you must explicitly stop it.
      Parameters:
      var - The R variable to return
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - if R cannot be started
      See Also:
      stopStreamConsumers()

    • StopRCallerOnline

      @Deprecated public void StopRCallerOnline()
      Deprecated.
      Stops underlying R process gracefully. No calculations should be running.

    • stopRCallerOnline

      public void stopRCallerOnline()
      Stops underlying R process gracefully. No calculations should be running.

    • StopRCallerAsync

      @Deprecated public void StopRCallerAsync()
      Deprecated.
      Stops underlying R process anyway. May be used from separate thread to terminate running calculations.

    • stopRCallerAsync

      public void stopRCallerAsync()
      Stops underlying R process anyway. May be used from separate thread to terminate running calculations.

    • runAndReturnResult

      public void runAndReturnResult​(String var) throws ExecutionException
      Runs the current code and returns the R variable "var". The R process is terminated upon completion of this method.
      Parameters:
      var - the R variable to return
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - if R could be started; if a temporary file to store the results could not be created; if the temporary file is corrupt. The exact cause will be added to the stack trace

    • redirectROutputToFile

      public void redirectROutputToFile​(String name, boolean appendToExisting) throws FileNotFoundException
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException

    • redirectROutputToStream

      public void redirectROutputToStream​(OutputStream o)

      public RCallerOptions getRCallerOptions()
